0.2.name: wordpress/visual-editor-tinymce-buttons
0.2.description:
Simple pugin adds extra buttons like font family, font size, hr and more to the default WordPress Tinymce Visual Editor.

Support Me: If you want to support me the developer of the plugin so I can improve this plugin more and add features Please purchase my premium plugin. Thank You.
